local_schema.short_desc: Uyibonisa njani inkonzo efikeleleka ngqo ye-DNS-SD
local_schema.longdesc: Amaxabiso anokubakhona ngala "merged", "separate" kunye "disabled".

local_schema.short_desc: Ukumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha ezenzekelayo ye-URL kwikhompyutha esebenza njengemqobo
local_schema.longdesc: i-URL enika amaxabiso okumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo.
Isiqhagamsheli esisematshinini esichazwa yi- "/systrem/proxy/socks_host" kwikhompyutha osebenza kuyo esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-SOCKS
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini kwikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ongasebenza kuyo.
Isiqhagamsheli ematshinini esichazwa yi -"/system/proxy/ftp_host" osebenza kuyo njengekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-FTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-FTP.

local_schema.short_desc: Isiqhagamsheli sekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo se-HTTP ekhuselekileyo
local_schema.longdesc: Isiqhagamsheli esisematshinini esichazwa yi- "/system/proxy/secure_host" kwikhompyutha osebenza kuyo esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ekhuselekileyo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-HTTP ekhuselekileyo.
Khetha inkqubo emiselweyo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo. Amaxabiso axhaswayo ngala "none", "manual", "auto".

Eli qhosha liqulethe uluhlu lwabaququzeleli abaqhagamshelwe kuvimba weefayili, kunokuba badlule kwikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo (ukuba iyasebenza). Amaxabiso anokuba ngamagama abaququzeleli, imimandla (usebenzisa i-wildcard njenge *.foo.com), idilesi ze-IP zabaququzeleli (zombini i-IPv4 ne-IPv6) kunye needilesi zothungelwano ene-netmask (into efana ne-192.168.0.0/24).
i-Password yokudlula njengoqinisekiso xa usebenzisa ikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo kwi-HTTP.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomsebenzisi wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomsebenzisi ukudlula njengoqinisekiso xa usebenzisa ikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP.
Isiqhagamsheli ematshinini esichazwa nge- "/system/http_proxy/host" oqhagamshela kuso.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-HTTP.
Yenza ukuba imimiselo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo xa usebenza nge-HTTP kwi-intanethi.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba okanye utshixo lwekeyboard luvuliwe okanye akunjalo
local_schema.longdesc: Noba okanye utshixo lwekeyboard luvuliwe.
Nokuba ngaba okanye iskrini sekhefu lokuchwetheza singamiswa okanye akunjalo.
Inani lemizuzu yokuphela kwekhefu lokuchwetheza.
Inani lemizuzu yexesha lokuchwetheza ngaphambi kokuqala kwemowudi yekhefu.
Setela kwinyaniso ukuvala zonke iinkqubo zangaphandle zokutyhila okukhawulezayo, ezizimeleyo noba zivalwe/zivulwe ngokuzimeleyo.
Nokuba ngaba kudlalwe izandi kwiinkqubo zomsebenzisi.
Vula isandi seseva kungeno.

Igama lefonti yekhesa. Ukuba ayisetwanga, ifonti emiyo iyasetyenziswa. Olu ncedo luqhutywa ekuqaleni kwiseva X kwiseshini nganye, kengoko ukuyitshintsha phakathi akusayi kuba nasizathu de kube lixesha elilandelayo ungena.
Umda ngokwee-pixel isalathisi kufuneka sihambe ngaphambi kokusebenza kwentshukumo ekhawulezayo yemawusi. Ixabiso elingu-1 yinkqubo emiyo.
Isiphinda-phindi sokhawuleziso kwintshukumo yemawusi. Ixabiso elingu-1 yinkqubo emiyo.
uncedo olunokubakho "on", "off", and "custom".
Ikhusela umsebenzisi ekulungiseni useto lokushicilela. Umzekelo, oku kuya kuvala ufikelelo kuzo zonke iinkqubo' "Useto loShicilelo" iibhokisi.
Ikhusela umsebenzisi ekushicileleni. Umzekelo, oku kuya kuvala ufikelelo kuzo zonke iinkqubo' "Shicilela" iibhokisi.
Ikhusela umsebenzisi ekugcineni iifayili kwidisk. Umzekelo, oku kungavala ufikelelo kuzo zonke iinkqubo' "Gcina njenge" iibhokisi.
Ikhusela umsebenzisi ekufikeleleni kwitheminali okanye ekubaluleni umgca wemiyalelo ekufuneka usetyenzisiwe. Umzekelo, oku kuya kuvala ufikelelo kuzo zonke iinkqubo' "Qhuba iNkqubo" iibhokisi.
Nokuba ngaba ukusebenzisa ifonti yecustom kwigtk+ iinkqubo.
Igama lefonti elungelelanisiweyo (ububanzi obuzinzisiweyo) kusetyenziso kwiindawo ezinjengeetheminali.
Igama leGTK+ indlela yegalelo leSimbo seSimo esisetyenziswe yigtk+.
Igama leGTK+ indlela yegalelo leSimbo sePreedit esisetyenziswa yigtk+.
Igama lefonti emiyo esetyenziswe yigtk+.
Igama elisisiseko somxholo omiyo osetyenziswa yi-gtk+.
Igama elisisiseko somxholo omiyo osetyenziswa yi-gtk+.
Umxholo womfanekiso ongumqondiso ekufuneka usetyenzisiwe kwindawo yolawulo, inautilus, njl-njl.
Nokuba ngaba oopopayi bangaboniswa. Qaphela: Eli liqhosha lehlabathi jikelele, litshintsha imo kamanejala wefestile, indawo yolawulo, njl-njl.
Umbala oseKunene okanye eZantsi xa uzoba ukuthambeka, awusetyenziswa kumbala ongqindilili.
Umbala osekhohlo okanye Phezulu xa uzoba ukuthambeka, okanye umbala ongqindilili.
Sukusebenza xa kucofwe amaqhosha amabini ngaxeshanye.

Inkqubo yekhompyutha omawuyisebenzise ukujonga iifayili ezifuna isixhobo ukuzijonga. Ixabiso lento ejikajikayo %s kuyakubakhona endaweni yalo iifayili ze-URIs, ixabiso lento ejikayo %c kuyakubakhona endaweni yaloisixhobo se-IID.
Isiphumezi-miyalelo esisetyenzisiweyo ekuqaliseni iinkqubo kwitheminali echazwe liqhosha 'exec'.
Yinyani ukuba umyalelo osetyenzisiweyo ukukhombisa olu hlobo lwe- URL kufuneka uqhutywe kwi-terminal.
Umyalelo osetyenziselwa ukukhombisa u- "h323" URLs, ukuba wenziwe ukuba usebenze.

local_schema.longdesc: Yinyani ukuba umyalelo obaluliweyo kwiqhosha "command" kufuneka ukhombise u-"h323" URLs.

Umyalelo osetyenziswayo ukukhombisa u- "callto" URLs, ukuba wenziwe ukuba usebenze.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe yisayizi yesiqhelo
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza isayizi yefonti ibe yeqhelekileyo. Libonakiliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo kunesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe ncinane. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswa kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyikubakho sinqumli kwesi senzo.

local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elimnqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe inkulu. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboad sokuvula kwakho ungakhuphanga kumbane kunye nokucima i-terminal
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha lesinqumli se-keyboard sokuvula kwakhona ungakhuphanga kumbane kunye nokucima i-terminal. local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha lesinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza i-toggle yokubonakala kwe-menubar. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama kulungiselelo olufanayo lwe-GTK+ iifayili zovimba. local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuveza inkqubo egcweleyo yesikrini. Libonakaliswe ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokukopa umbhalo okhethiweyo uye kwi-clipboard. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo ensetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sishunquli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvala i-window. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvala i-tab. Elibonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovima. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko le ndlela kuluhlu lwagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuzisa unxibelelwano lokudalwa kwenkangeleko. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziselwe i-GTK+iifayili zikavimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuye kluluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard yesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvula i-window entsha. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngab umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvula i-tab entsha. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuyisebenzisa inkqubo okanye ukungayisebenzisi
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, i-terminal iyakusebenzisa ifonti esemgangathweni ye-desktop-global ukuba ngaba inesithuba esinye (kunye nefonti efana kakhulu enokuza nayo ngenye indlela).

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukusebenzisa imibala esuka kumxholo we-terminal yesixhobo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, i-scheme somxholo wombala osetyenziswe kwiibhokisi zongeniso lombhalo ziya kusetyenziselwa i-terminal, endaweni yemibala enikwa ngumsebenzisi.

Misela ukuba yeyiphi ikhowudi iqhosha le-delete eliyenzayo. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala-"ascii-del" kuphawu lwe-ASCII DEL, "control-h ku-Control-H (AKA uphawu lwe-ASCII BS), "escape sequence" kulandelelwano lokuphepha olubotshelelwe ku-backspace okanye u-delete. "escape sequence" ngokuqhelekileyo utahthwa njengomiselo oluqhelekileyo lweqhosha lika-Delete.

Misela ukuba yeyiphi ikhowudi iqhosha le-backspace eliyenzayo. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala-"ascii-del" ngophawu lwe-ASCII DEL, "control-h" ku-Control-H (AKA uphawu lwe-ASCII BS), "escape-sequence" kulandelelwano lokuphepha olubotshelelwe ku-backspace okanye u-delete. "ascii-del" ngokuqhelekileyo uthathwa njengomiselo oluchanekileyo lweqhosha le-Backspace.

local_schema.short_desc: Uwenza ube mnyama kanjani umfanekiso wokungasemva
local_schema.longdesc: Ixabiso eliphakathi kuka-0.0 kunye no-1.0 elikhombisa ukuba umfanekiso wokungasemva wenziwe mnyama kangakanani. U-0.0 uthetha ukuba akukho bumnyama. U-1.0 uthetha ukuba kumnyama ngokuphelelyo. Kuphunyezo lwangoku, kukho imigangatho emibini kuphela enokwenzeka, ngoko ke ummiselo uziphethe njenge-boolean, apho u-0.0 enza ukuba kungasebenzi okwenza mnyama.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa umfanekiso wokungasemva
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, hlisa unyusa umfanekiso wokungasemva ngombhalo wokungangambili; ukuba ayiyonyani, gcina umfanekiso ukwisikhundla esimileyo uze uhlise unyusa umbhalo ongaphezu kwawo.
Igama lefayili lomfanekiso wokungasemva.
Igama lefoni i-Pango. Imizekelo yile-"Sans 12" okanye "Monospace Bold 14".

i-Terminals zinemibala yengqokelo yezixhobo ezili-16 Iinkqubo zekhompyutha ezingaphakathi kwe-terminal ezingazisebenzisa. Le yileya ngqokelela yezixhobo, engohlobo loluhlu olwahlulwe yikholoni lwamagama emibala. Amagama emibala kufuneka ukuba abe ngoholo lwe-hex "#FF00FF"
Umfaneksio ongumqondiso wokusetyanziswa kwii-taba/windows uqulethe le nkangeleko.

local_schema.short_desc: Umyalezo ozenzele wona ukuba uwusebenzise endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo
local_schema.longdesc: Qhuba lo myalelo endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo, ukuba use_custom_command uyinyani.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuqhuba umyalelo ozenzele wona endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, umiselo lwexabiso lomyalelo_ozenzele wona uya kusetyenziswa endaweni yokuqhuba itoliki yemiyalelo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlaziya iirekhodi zokungena xa undulula umyalelo we-terminal
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, iirekhodi zenkqubo yokungena i-utmp kunye ne-wtmp ziya kuhlaziywa xa umyalelo ongaphakathi kwe-terminal undululwa.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukundulula umyalelo kwi-terminal njengetoliki yemiyalelo yongeno
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, umyalelo ongaphakathi kwe-terminal uyakundululwa njengetoliki yemiyalelo yokungena. (argv[0] uya kuba nekhonkco phakathi kwamagama.)

local_schema.short_desc: Into omawuyenze nge-terminal xa umyalelo ongumntwana ukhona
local_schema.longdesc: Amaxabiso anokuba khona a-"close" ukuvala i-terminal, kunye no-"restart" wuvule kwakhona umyalelo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa uye ezantsi xa kukho iziphumo ezitsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, nanini na xa kukho iziphumo ezitsha i-terminal iya kuhla inyuka iye ezantsi.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa uye ezantsi xa iqhosha licinezelwe
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, ukucinezela iqhosha kutsiba i-scrollbar kuye ezantsi.

Xa ukhetha umbhalo nge-word, ukulandelelana kwezi mpawu zithathwa njengamagama angawodwa. Uluhlu lunganikwa njengo-"A-Z". i-Literal hyphen (engabonisi uluhlu) kufuneka ibe luphawu lokuqala olunikiweyo.
Ukuba yinyani, ungenzi ngxolo xa inkqubo yekhompyutha ithulela ukulandelelana kokuphepha kwintsimbi ye-terminal.
Ukuba yinyani, vumela inkqubo yekhompyutha kwi-terminal ukwenza ukuba umbhalo ubonakale ungqindilili.

local_schema.short_desc: Into omawuyenze ngesihloko esenzeka ngaxesha nye
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba ngaba inkqubo yekhompyutha ekwi-terminal imisela isihloko (abantu abaninzi abanjalo banetoliki yemiyalelo emiselwe ukuba yenze oku), umiselo lwesihloko esinokutshintsha sinokucima isihloko sokumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha, hamba phambi kwaso, hamba emva kwaso, okanye beka esinye endaweni yaso. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala "replace", "before", "after", kunye no-"ignore".
Misela umbala wokungasemva kwe-terminal, njengobalulo lombala (inokuba luhlobo lwe-HTML-isimbo se-hex digits, okanye igama lombala elifana no-"red").
Umbala omiselweyo wombhalo kwi-terminal, ubalulo lombala (lunokuba yi-HTML-isimbo se-hex digits, okanye igama lombala elifana no "red").
Yinayni ukuba ngaba i-menubar kufuneka iboniswe kwi-windows entsha, kwi-windows/ii-tabs kule nkangeleko.
Igama elinokufundwa ngumntu lenkangeleko.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukucela uqinisekiso xa uvala i-terminal yefestile
local_schema.longdesc: Nokuba ngaba ukucela uqinisekiso xa uvala i-terminal yefestile enangaphezulu kwe-tab enye evuliweyo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba isinqumli esisemgangathweni se-GTK sofikelelo kwi-menubar senziwe ukuba singasebenzi
local_schema.longdesc: Ngokuqhelekileyo ungafikelela kwi-menubar ngo-F10. Oku usenokuzenzela ngokugqitha ku-gtkrc (gtk-menu-bar-accel = "nayiphina"). Oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuvumela isinqumlisi esisemgangathweni se-menubar ukuba singasebenzi.
Nokuba ngaba ukuba neqhosha lofikelelo lwe-Alt+unobumba we-menubar. Zinokuphazamisa ezinye iinkqubo zekhompyutha eziqhutywa ngaphakathi kwe-terminal ngoko ke kunokwenzeka ukuba zicinywe.
Inkangeleko emayisetyenziswe xa kuvulwa i-window entsha okanye i-tab. Mayibe profile_list.
Uluhlu lweenkangeleko ezaziwayo kwi-gnome-terminal. Uluhlu luqulethe uluhlu lwamagama olubiza oovinjana beefayili ezinxulumene ne-/apps/gnome-terminal/profiles.
